name: Sunyata Flower
description:
Select a card from your Support Zone and discard it. After that, randomly generate 2 Support Cards in your hand.
During the Round, the next time you play a Support Card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die.
descriptionraw: Select a card from your Support Zone and discard it. After that, randomly generate 2 Support Cards in your hand.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>During the Round, the next time you play a Support Card: </color>Spend 1 less Elemental Die.
descriptionreplaced: Select a card from your Support Zone and discard it. After that, randomly generate 2 Support Cards in your hand.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>During the Round, the next time you play a Support Card: </color>Spend 1 less Elemental Die.
storytext:
"This vibrant color is the miracle of life's flowing springs."
"Abide with me, sing and caper with me, and let us weave eternal joy"...
